sentences.english: I threw the brick because no one else would stop.
sentences.chinese: 我丟磚塊是因爲沒有人停下來，小男孩兒聲淚俱下。

sentences.english: How did Tieguai Li always lose things?
sentences.chinese: 這鐵柺李怎麼老丟東西？

sentences.english: He felt he lost face when his teacher scolded him in front of the class.
sentences.chinese: 當老師當着全體同學的面批評他時他感到面子大丟。

sentences.english: I Tertius, who wrote this epistle, salute you in the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 我這代筆寫信的德丟，在主裏面問你們安。

sentences.english: MengFei resigned from the galactic work, but in the heart of the earth can't throw Chen son.
sentences.chinese: 孟菲辭去了銀河工作，但是陳超心裏照舊丟不下欣兒。

sentences.english: We throw bean bags and do sit-ups.
sentences.chinese: 我們玩丟沙包而且做仰臥起坐。

sentences.english: I am a bit too, and habits of the things is not willing to lose.
sentences.chinese: 我就是太念舊，習慣的東西不捨得丟。

sentences.english: Why do you litter up the desk with these newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼老是把這些報紙亂七八糟地丟桌子上呢？

sentences.english: From before, two actors had made plan to throw the director into the water.
sentences.chinese: 在那之前，兩個演員就計畫好要把導演丟進水裏。

sentences.english: I always lose them and find them again.
sentences.chinese: 我老是會弄丟鑰匙，之後再找回來。

sentences.english: I bike throwing, huff went away.
sentences.chinese: 我把自行車一丟，氣呼呼的走了。

sentences.english: Why is he always losing things?
